item.title: Multi Step Workflows with the Critter Stack
item.description: I’m working with a JasperFx Software client who is in the beginning stages of building a pretty complex, multi-step file import process that is going to involve several different services. For the sake of example code in this post, let’s say that we have the (much simplified from my client’s actual logical workflow) workflow from … Continue reading Multi Step Workflows with the Critter Stack → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.com/2024/10/01/multi-step-workflows-with-the-critter-stack/
